modEffects: Increase the durability of the armor by +25% (round up).

Gain +3 Skill Levels on Vigilance checks when it's about hearing. The suite also allows you to filter sounds and set up an encrypted network of communication with others within 10km. Deactivates when the armor reaches 0 durability.
Triples the duration of the power armor's battery.
Adds +2 Soak against melee attacks and plasma projectiles.
Can be activated once to reduce the distance class of a fall by 10. After use, it requires at least 5 Minutes to recharge.
The armor and its mods remain operable even when durability is 0.
Negates the armor penetration of lasers.
The armor gains the Vacuum-Sealed quality and becomes usable in space by protecting against the dangers of vacuum, while providing life support for several hours.
The user gains +2 Speed and a +1 pool bonus on melee and defense checks. Deactivates when the armor reaches 0 durability.
Adds +2 Soak against explosions and falling damage.
Increase the durability of the armor by +50% (round up). Cannot be combined with the Advanced Materials.
Gain +3 Skill Levels on Vigilance checks when it's about seeing something. The suite also allows zooming, video recording and similar perks. Deactivates when the armor reaches 0 durability.
